meanings.definition: The amount that a truck can hold.
meanings.sent1: The farmer needed several truckfuls of hay to feed his animals.
meanings.sent2: The construction company ordered truckfuls of cement for the project.
meanings.sent3: The kids imagined a truckfuls of candy falling from the sky!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like truckfuls of joy.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was overflowing with truckfuls of gold coins.

meanings.definition: A large quantity that can be transported by a truck.
meanings.sent1: The supermarket received truckfuls of fresh produce every morning.
meanings.sent2: After the harvest, the farmers had truckfuls of apples to sell.
meanings.sent3: The birthday party was a blast with truckfuls of balloons everywhere!
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like truckfuls of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The library had truckfuls of books waiting to be read by eager readers.
